tool_description: Cadastral situation of Brazilian holders in the Federal Revenue Agency of Brazil (Receita Federal do Brasil) from a CPF number. Consulte a situação cadastral do CPF junto a Receita Federal com esta API.
name: Cadastral Situation of the Brazilian CPF numbers
title: Cadastral Situation of the Brazilian CPF numbers
tool_name: Cadastral Situation of the Brazilian CPF numbers

api_list.name: Check Brazilian CPF Number
api_list.description: Obtains the full name, birth date, gender and the cadastral situation of the Brazilian citizen from a CPF number
